bibl.title: Pebbles Inscribed in Demotic from a Burial in the Tomb of Padikem at Tuna el-Gebel.
bibl.note: Edition of 15 pebbles inscribed in Demotic with divine names and found in Padikem's tomb. Tuna el-Gebel, 3rd century B.C. - Introduction. - The demotic inscribed divine names. - Analysis. - The specific quantity of pebbles: 15. - Possible parallels. - The protective function of the fifteen pebbles. - Material. - Conclusion. - Pp. 88-89: Another pebble from the same tomb.
bibl.seg: Martina Minas-Nerpel, Pebbles Inscribed in Demotic from a Burial in the Tomb of Padikem at Tuna el-Gebel.

Edition of 15 pebbles inscribed in Demotic with divine names and found in Padikem's tomb. Tuna el-Gebel, 3rd century B.C. - Introduction. - The demotic inscribed divine names. - Analysis. - The specific quantity of pebbles: 15. - Possible parallels. - The protective function of the fifteen pebbles. - Material. - Conclusion. - Pp. 88-89: Another pebble from the same tomb.
